Weather: Wet, windy conditions forecast for Northland, Auckland, Coromandel Peninsula, heavy rain watches issued https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-wet-windy-conditions-forecast-for-northland-auckland-coromandel-peninsula-heavy-rain-watches-issued/JXRL7VZARJHHVMHXJVUT6KCKDY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-wet-windy-conditions-forecast-for-northland-auckland-coromandel-peninsula-heavy-rain-watches-issued/JXRL7VZARJHHVMHXJVUT6KCKDY/ “Thunderstorms and localised downpours are possible, especially from Monday evening.” Sun, 19 Jan 2025 06:08:04 +0000 Residents at the top of the North Island should pack a raincoat as a wet and windy start to the week has been forecast for the third week of January.

AB Lime quarry worker loses job after jail absence, Employment Relations Authority backs dismissal https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ab-lime-quarry-worker-loses-job-after-jail-absence-era-backs-dismissal/SEGKYY2LLNEAXJTAROOOIJNURE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ab-lime-quarry-worker-loses-job-after-jail-absence-era-backs-dismissal/SEGKYY2LLNEAXJTAROOOIJNURE/ Tracy NealHis partner tried to inform the company, but the details were unclear. Sun, 19 Jan 2025 03:00:00 +0000 A quarry worker was sacked after he failed to properly communicate to his boss that the reason he wasn't at work was because he was in prison. Photo / 123RF
